title: folio.
subtitle: Minimal whiteboard for sketching and prototyping
description: Folio is a minimalistic digital whiteboard for sketching and prototyping. It is designed to be simple and easy to use, with a focus on speed and efficiency.

hero.label: Sketch. Design. Prototype.
hero.subtitle: Folio is an infinite canvas for your creative journey. Sketch, prototype, and bring your ideas to life with ease.

items.title: Design with total Privacy.
items.description: We are committed to keeping your work private and secure. For that reason, folio uses the local storage of your browser to ensure that your drawings are accessible only to you.

items.title: Boundless Canvas.
items.description: Unleash your imagination on an infinite canvas. Whether you are sketching, prototyping, or creating, folio provides limitless space for your creativity to flourish.

items.title: Organize your ideas.
items.description: The new Pages feature allows you to organize your drawings into distinct pages, making it effortless to manage and present your ideas.

items.title: Save, Organize, and Reuse Elements.
items.description: Use the Library to create a personal repository of reusable components. Import and export your collections to collaborate or organize projects, and sync across all boards for consistent access.

sections.name: studio
sections.label: Introducing Folio Studio.
sections.subtitle: A self-hosted whiteboard built for creators and designers who prefer full control and zero distractions.

sectionOptions.label: Introducing Folio Studio.
sectionOptions.description: A lightweight editor for sketching structures, interfaces, and ideas. Folio Studio runs entirely on your machine.
